Richardson.Richland College: Richland College is a community college that is part of the Dallas County Community College District and is located in the Lake Highlands area of Dallas, Texas (United States) near the border with Richardson and Garland. The school was founded in 1972 and is the largest school in the DCCCD, featuring about 20,000 students. Located on the old Jackson farm, the campus comprises 155 acres (63 hectares) and has preserved the rural beauty with a brook flowing through the campus.
